name: You're Boned
description:
Note: Gore is disableable via the menu in the first level by pressing the escape key

A powerful psychic meets his end, and loses his body! Even so, he's not out for the count yet. Stranded in Hell, all he can do is fight his way out - and even with his psychic powers that's easier said than done! 

You're Boned is a top-down roguelike shooter where you're a psychic skull trying to take out the underworld and re-earn your spot among the living!  

Made by in one week by Elijah Simmons and Adam Zuber for the September 2021 SGDA Game Jam

-Free music by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio

-Font is Alagard by Hewett Tsoi

I don't really know if it's possible to beat, I know I can't
